channel.title: IOT on 我的杂货铺
channel.description: Recent content in IOT on 我的杂货铺

item.title: NodeMCU环境搭建 MAC(1)
item.description: 1. arduino install https://www.arduino.cc/en/software 2. ESP8266 install config http://arduino.esp8266.com/stable/package_esp8266com_index.json install esp8266 开发板 3. Test usb 连接好nodemcu 设置端口 选择blink
